Posts.Content: Hi there I had a marker and had oozing from site and a lump appear which I can only put down to the marker x
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy markers

Posts.Content: Ditto! Exercise 3 times a week, eat healthy never smoked or touched drugs and normal drinking habits and still get it!!! So much for healthy living but hopefully at least won’t have heart disease! X
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy and fasting

Posts.Content: Hi there I had expander put in 6 weeks ago following mastectomy and can honestly say best choice I made as when I’ve got my bra on I have a good set of knockers lol (I am only small busted 34C) but honestly you wouldn’t know. They put mine under the pec muscle so it looks very natural when wearing low cut tops. I will have implant in a year xx PM me if you need to xx
Posts.Title: Advice please! Cannot decide between LD flap and implant or expanders...

Posts.Content: Hi there, the blue will be the dye they put in and it can stay for upto a year so don’t scrub it xx
Posts.Title: Dry skin/healing

Posts.Content: Hi there just some advice regards private care. A lady I know went private but the after care/support from the breast care nurses wasn’t there. Yes you see a surgeon/oncologist but all the after care isn’t there.  All the best xx
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi ladies I shall be in this group! See the oncologist at Christie’s Thursday to finalise details. My hair is long and curly but gets every 4 weeks as white! Not going for cold cap despite loving my hair. Will go wig shopping Thursday ready for the chop. Just want to get started now xx
Posts.Title: April diagnosis group

Posts.Content: Good luck! I’m sat waiting to be seen by oncologist xx
Posts.Title: April diagnosis group

Posts.Content: Ditto x
Posts.Title: April diagnosis group

Posts.Content: Hi where I worked in a ED department 6 of us had/have breast cancer!!!  On wards staff that I know of 5!!  2 friends out of work!!! Massive numbers in my circle alone! Xx
Posts.Title: Amount of people with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi there I had my mastectomy with adm reconstruction a week ago and apart from first few days where painful the pains now easing and my new boob starting to take shape.  You can do this xx
Posts.Title: What is the prognosis for inflammatory breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi I’ve had expander 3 weeks ago at same time as mastectomy I have to say I’m very impressed x

Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi ladies had chemo on Friday EC nausea and vomiting and the most awful headache since. Can cope with nausea but this headache won’t shift any tips appreciated x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Feel for you although my first EC very uneventful but about 4pm horrendous nausea and then vomiting with awful headache!! Ended up taking today’s anti sick pills in pure desperation! Cried a lot thought this is bloody awful!!! Not sure how I feel this morning darnt get up lol xx Can’t have ginger as it’s the devil taste lol x Good luck ladies xx
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Thanks ladies will contact BCN first thing in morning. Supposed to be going wig shopping tomorrow but honestly if feel like this that’s going to have to wait xx
